vehicles.description: There is a large yellow construction vehicle directly ahead, occupying the rightmost lane and partially straddling the middle lane.
vehicles.explanation: Its size and positioning can obstruct the road ahead and potentially cause traffic to slow down or merge left.

vehicles.description: A few cars are visible, driving in the middle and left-most lanes further ahead, with their rear lights on, indicating active traffic
vehicles.explanation: Their presence and behaviors will affect the flow and speed of traffic also requiring potential speed adjustments and vigilance for any sudden stops.

other objects.description: Glare and reflections on the wet road surface caused by the surrounding vehicle lights and street illumination.
other objects.explanation: This can hinder visibility and the ability to promptly detect road users or changes in the driving environment, requiring the ego car to proceed with enhanced caution.

suggestions: Considering the presence of construction equipment, active traffic, and a wet road surface, the ego car should maintain a safe following distance from the construction vehicle ahead, be prepared to merge left if necessary, adjust speed to match traffic flow, and drive with added caution due to potentially slippery road conditions. Additionally, heed the traffic sign indicating the road will curve to the right, and be aware of any vehicles that may change lanes or merge from the right.
